question: Who has been appointed as the new prime minister of France?
explanation:
The President of France Emmanuel Macron has named Jean Castex as the next French Prime Minister.
The previous Prime Minister Edouard Philippe had resigned earlier. The President has reshuffled the Government to restart the countryâ€™s economy. Jean Castex is a 55-year-old public servant, who has also coordinated the re-opening strategy in the country.
